overview: They've got the looks, they've got the attitude, and most important, they've got the goods to satisfy. Hooked Up is about guys getting together and getting off. When the desire is this raw there is no hesitation. The fiery heat doesn't let up until the lust is satisfied. They always get what they're after... always get what they need... always get off... and then it's on to the next one. When these guys are on the hunt they're looking to get Hooked Up.
title: Hooked Up
